scripts.build: node sass-to-css.js && parcel build src/js/index.js --out-dir dist --out-file bundle.js --no-source-maps
scripts.watch: node sass-to-css.js && node -e "require('fs').watchFile('src/sass/main.scss', () => { console.log('Sass file changed, recompiling...'); require('./sass-to-css.js'); }); console.log('Watching for Sass changes...');"
